scoringPlays.text: Newman Williams 4 Yd pass from Kato Nelson (Nick Gasser Kick)
Van Edwards Jr. 20 Yd Run (Nick Gasser Kick)
Tony Poljan 1 Yd Run (Ryan Tice Kick)

videos.headline: Akron QB finds wide-open Williams for TD
videos.description: Akron strikes first as Kato Nelson finds a wide-open Newman Williams for a 4-yard touchdown.
